3. Experiment, fail and reflectI think one of the most dangerous things that can happen to a teacher is to find something that works, and then keep on doing the same thing. Trying out new things and failing is not only great for professional learning. It is also a useful lesson for the students. To see the whole process of trying out something new, it not working, and then look at the reasons is the best learning experience. For me this is one of the most powerful ways of learning.
